name: tsa-monorepo
description: Texas Sports Academy - Unified Monorepo with Centralized Endpoint Management

scripts.dev: npm run sync:endpoints && concurrently "npm run dev:coach" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:staging: npm run sync:endpoints:staging && concurrently "npm run dev:coach:staging" "npm run dev:admin:staging"
scripts.dev:prod: npm run sync:endpoints:prod && concurrently "npm run dev:coach:prod" "npm run dev:admin:prod"
scripts.dev:coach:staging: npm run sync:endpoints:staging && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-platform-frontend
scripts.dev:admin:staging: npm run sync:endpoints:staging && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-admin-frontend
scripts.dev:coach:prod: npm run sync:endpoints:prod && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-platform-frontend
scripts.dev:admin:prod: npm run sync:endpoints:prod && npm run dev --workspace=tsa-admin-frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:coach && npm run build:admin
scripts.test:all: npm run test:coach && npm run test:admin
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:coach && npm run lint:admin
scripts.clean: npm run clean:coach && npm run clean:admin && npm run clean:infra
scripts.install:services: cd tsa-platform-frontend && npm install && cd ../tsa-admin-frontend && npm install && cd ../tsa-coach-backend && npm install
scripts.bootstrap: npm run install:all && npm run sync:endpoints && npm run build:all
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run sync:endpoints && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development'
scripts.env:setup: echo 'ðŸ“‹ Setting up environment file...' && cp .env.example .env && echo 'âœ… Created .env from .env.example' && echo 'âš ï¸  Remember to replace placeholder values with real API keys!'
